spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning roughly matches (living/dining/kitchen at top; two bedrooms at bottom), but multiple plan-level mismatches: the central entry/foyer and connecting hallway geometry is simplified/shifted; the kitchen footprint and its relationship to the closet/bath zone on the left is altered; bathroom shapes/positions do not align cleanly with the 2D plan; door locations along the hall and into bedrooms/baths do not match the plan’s indicated openings; window placement appears incomplete beyond the large living-room window, with bedroom exterior windows not clearly represented in the same locations as the plan. Noticeable room proportion drift (living area oversized relative to bedrooms/hall; left service zone compressed).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall network is simplified and several partitions do not follow the 2D wall jogs (notably the left-side bathroom/coat/closet cluster and the hall). Adjacency is partially preserved (kitchen next to dining/living; bedrooms separated), but the exact closet/coat storage relationships are not faithfully reproduced. Door embeddings/openings appear inconsistent with the plan (hall-to-living opening, bath doors, bedroom doors). Likely missing or materially altered closet/coat storage spaces; no clear evidence of an added full extra room, but several elements read as non-plan partitions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is generic and only loosely corresponds to the plan: dining table and living seating are present but not matched in placement/orientation; bedroom furniture is simplified; kitchen fixtures/island/peninsula do not match the plan’s layout. Scale reads plausible overall, but several items (kitchen run/peninsula and living seating group) do not align to the 2D proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera is broadly isometric and composition is clear. Lighting is flat/low-contrast and the render looks slightly foggy/low-detail, reducing edge definition. Geometry is mostly clean, but some walls/edges look softened and simplified, which hurts clarity for verification. Projection is not strictly orthographic (reads like mild perspective isometric).

detected_errors.description: Entry/foyer and central hallway geometry does not match the 2D plan’s bottom-center entry and corridor layout (walls/voids simplified and shifted).
Kitchen footprint and boundary with the left-side service zone (bath/coat/closet) is reconfigured compared to the 2D plan.
Closet near the kitchen (top-left closet in plan) is not clearly present as a distinct enclosed room in the 3D render.
Coat storage area/closet indicated near the left bathroom in the plan is not clearly represented as shown in 3D.
Bathroom locations/shapes are inconsistent with the plan (left bathroom and the central bottom bathroom appear resized/shifted; door positions do not align).
Several interior door placements/orientations (hall-to-bath, hall-to-bedrooms, hall-to-living opening) do not match the 2D door locations and swings.
Window placement appears incomplete relative to the plan: beyond the large living-room window, bedroom exterior windows are not clearly shown in corresponding locations.
Room proportion distortion: living/dining area reads oversized while bedrooms/hall/service areas read compressed compared to the plan’s relative proportions.
Non-plan partition treatment (e.g., glass/railing-like elements around the kitchen/hall area) appears added and not indicated in the 2D plan.
Render appears slightly hazy/low-detail, reducing geometric legibility (soft edges and low contrast).
